```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggplot2)
library(darksky)
library(purrr)

```

Loading Data
```{r}

load('./all_sites.Rdata')

str(merge_temp_location)

# Pulling Sunrise and Sunset

?get_forecast_for

drk_sky_tmp <- get_forecast_for(40.556899, -105.611251, 
                                timestamp = "2019-07-01T12:00:00",
                                exclude = 'currently')

daily_data <- drk_sky_tmp$daily
hourly_data <- drk_sky_tmp$hourly

date_string <- merge_temp_location %>%
  select(date) %>%
  mutate(date = date(date))%>%
  unique(.)

date = date_string$date

date_df <- date_string %>%
  mutate(time = "T12:00:00-0400")%>%
  unite(when, c(date, time), sep = "")%>%
  mutate(lat = 40.556899,
         long = -105.611251)

list_dates <- pmap(list(date_df$lat, date_df$long,
                        date_df$when), 
                   get_forecast_for)
names(list_dates) <- date_string$date


daily_drk <- list_dates%>%
  tibble()





daily_function <- function(x){
day <- list_dates$`x`
daily_day_1 <- day1$daily%>%
  select(1,4,5)
}

```
